Renaissance Italy: Utilize artistic skills to gain patronage and access to resources.
Ancient Greece: Develop knowledge of philosophy and theater to earn respect and influence.
Medieval Europe: Use knowledge of craftsmanship and trade to establish a guild and secure economic stability.
Industrial Revolution: Use technical skills and business acumen to become an entrepreneur and capitalize on new technologies.
Post-Apocalyptic Future: Use knowledge of sustainability and resource management to establish a self-sufficient community and protect against threats.
